item.title: How to Add Shopper Discounts by Sub-Department
item.dc:creator: dava-LOC
item.description: Information The eSuite software provides tools for defining a shopper discount by sub-department. This discount supersedes the regular sub-department discount. If a shopper discount is specified for a certain shopper level, the system will use this discount. Otherwise, it will cascade back to the sub-department discount.
